meanings.definition: Fail to meet the expectations or hopes of.
meanings.sent1: The movie really disappoints the audience when it doesn't have a happy ending.
meanings.sent2: She always disappoints her parents when she forgets to do her chores.
meanings.sent3: It disappoints the cat when the laser pointer suddenly stops working.
meanings.sent4: The fading sunset disappoints the sky, leaving it without vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The wilting flower disappoints the garden with its lack of bloom.

meanings.definition: Cause someone to feel sad or displeased because something did not happen as expected.
meanings.sent1: His absence disappoints his friends who were looking forward to seeing him.
meanings.sent2: The canceled picnic disappoints the children who were excited to play outside.
meanings.sent3: The empty cookie jar disappoints the sneaky raccoon who was hoping for a treat.
meanings.sent4: The broken promise disappoints the heart, leaving it heavy with sadness.
meanings.sent5: The lost puppy disappoints the family, who was eagerly waiting for its return.
